text: @realDonaldTrump Mr. President. With all due respect, this is irresponsible. In 2018 the overall death rate in the US was 0.7%. The death rate for #COVID19 is between 1%-3%, depending on how it gets treated. How can you possibly focus on the economy, when americans are dying NOW?
